{{short description|Hammer of Aulë}}
'''Maltar''' was the name of [[Aulë]]'s hammer, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name="Malt">{{PE|15}}, Appendix, ''Text V'', p. 15</ref> Nothing else is known about it.

== Etymology ==
The name '''''Maltar''''' is in [[Qenya]]. It is probably derived from the roots [[MALA]]- ("crush, squeeze, pulp"), and [[TARA]]- ("to batter, thud, beat").<ref name="Malt"/>
